item.title: For seamless spreads and gathers, add IDs while data are wide.
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(error = TRUE) library(tidyverse) library(magrittr) During a typical data munge I will frequenly transition a dataset back and forth between long and wide formats by using the gather() and spread() functions of tidyr. Frequently I would encounter this error message after trying to spread some data that previously gathered without issue: “Error: Duplicate identifiers for rows …”. I’ll attempt to clarify the conditions that give rise to this error so that you can resolve it.
